messages.title: Dear Voter
messages.content: Theresa May has called a snap general election which nobody wanted. She is gambling on gaining sufficient lobby fodder to dilute Brexit and give concessions to Brussels. Blackpool South certainly needs Labour out but deserves more than a Tory nodding dog and I therefore urge you to vote for me in this election. I believe in a thriving 52 weeks a year tourism economy, I welcome the jobs on offer in the fracking industry and I believe in REAL Brexit.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Advocates for 'REAL Brexit' without dilution or concessions to Brussels.
Believes in maintaining a thriving tourism economy operational all year round.
Welcomes jobs offered by the fracking industry.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Blackpool South certainly needs Labour out but deserves more than a Tory nodding dog.

issues.brexitEurope: Advocates for 'REAL Brexit' without dilution or concessions to Brussels.
issues.economy: Supports the local tourism economy and welcomes the fracking industry.
